function_call.name: classify_risks
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Neglect of local cultures and traditions in the pursuit of tourism experiences.","category":"Cultural risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Failure to engage tourists in conservation efforts and environmental awareness.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on community thinking may not always be practical or efficient in solving problems.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inequality in modern society due to emphasis on individualism over community spirit.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Disconnecting from over-connected life may impact awareness of health and safety measures","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Difficulty achieving theorization in all service sectors","category":"Operational risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of social legitimacy and acceptance of adaptive strategies","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Having informal close relationships and provision of reaching them for overcoming potential future financial constraints","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Service smes’ relationship building and process-enabling capabilities are critical for survival and sustainability in disruptive service conditions.","category":"Operational risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of ethical interaction capability in service smes","category":"Ethical risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Relational interactions during the pandemic","category":"Operational risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Nonopportunistic processes between actors in smes","category":"Operational risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of customer needs identification","category":"Operational risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate understanding of latent customer needs","category":"Operational risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Change in customer expectations and service requirements due to pandemic","category":"Operational risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Possible spread of contagious diseases in the workplace due to close proximity of employees.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of economic collapse for smes due to prolonged closures and reduced consumer activity.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Difficulty in adapting to remote work practices and maintaining productivity.","category":"Operational risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Cutting down on marketing and innovation budgets during a crisis","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementing new technologies without considering the realistic and beneficial aspects","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate integration between online and brick-and-mortar retailing","category":"Operational risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase in human interaction in offline retail spaces leading to higher risk of contagious disease spread","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shift towards more online shopping leading to greater reliance on delivery and logistics networks","category":"Operational risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges in achieving a seamless omnichannel shopping experience","category":"Operational risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Physical store crowding and safety management","category":"Operational risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate sensory appeals and social presence for online retailers","category":"Operational risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Accelerated adoption of digital solutions in traditional retailing","category":"Operational risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Neutralization of physical retailers’ characteristic strengths due to pandemic measures.","category":"Operational risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased online shopping due to the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Operational risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of physical and human touch in online retailing","category":"Operational risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Accelerated adoption of technology in brick-and-mortar and online retailing","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of social interaction in the built environment can contribute to the spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High cost of implementing complex technologies for social interaction and sensory input in online shops.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Indirect and direct impact of technology implementation on customer satisfaction and shopping experience.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The potential spread of contagious diseases through touch-based interfaces and remote human interaction technologies","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of contagious diseases through physical contact with actuator technology.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of contagious diseases through mid-air tactile enabling technologies.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased mobile traffic during covid-19 lockdown","category":"Operational risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Online retailers promoting ar app downloads","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Underutilization of touch-enabling sensory technologies in online retail","category":"Operational risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of tactile input in webshop experience","category":"Operational risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased reliance on visual and auditory stimuli","category":"Operational risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Higher mobile traffic during covid-19 lockdown","category":"Operational risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of physical inspection and trial opportunities for products online","category":"Operational risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Perceived risks leading to online shopping abandonment","category":"Operational risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of product returns on retailers’ bottom line","category":"Operational risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Virtual worlds and online shops with avatars could increase the risk of contagious diseases propagation due to the close interaction of people in virtual spaces.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to address the ’forgotten senses’ in online marketing could lead to suboptimal consumer information processing and a lack of differentiation in the cluttered online environment.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased risk of contagion due to physical proximity in virtual reality shopping experiences.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential risk of spreading contagious diseases through direct customer interactions via chatbots on social media platforms.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"}]}
